SELECT COUNT(ITEM_ID)-1 count, ov.* from ORDER_VIEW ov
member_id = #{memberId}
AND id in ( SELECT oi.order_id from ORDER_ITEM oi left join PRODUCT p on oi.product_id = p.id WHERE p.name LIKE '%${query}%' )
AND CATEGORY_ID < 3
group by id HAVING CANCEL_ID is null ORDER BY `DATE` DESC

SELECT COUNT(ITEM_ID)-1 count, ov.* from ORDER_VIEW ov WHERE REFUND_ID is not null or EXCHANGE_ID is not null or CANCEL_ID is not null
AND member_id = #{memberId}
AND id in ( SELECT oi.order_id from ORDER_ITEM oi left join PRODUCT p on oi.product_id = p.id WHERE p.name LIKE '%#{query}%' )
GROUP BY CANCEL_ID, EXCHANGE_ID , REFUND_ID ORDER BY `DATE` DESC, CNCL_DATE DESC, EXCH_REG_DATE DESC, RFND_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(ITEM_ID)-1 count, ov.* from ORDER_VIEW ov
member_id = #{memberId}
AND id in ( SELECT oi.order_id from ORDER_ITEM oi left join PRODUCT p on oi.product_id = p.id WHERE p.name LIKE '%#{query}%' )
group by id HAVING CANCEL_ID is not null ORDER BY CNCL_DATE DESC,`DATE` DESC

SELECT * from ORDER_VIEW ov
EXCHANGE_ID is not null
OR REFUND_ID is not null
OR EXCH_STATE <= #{sort}
OR RFND_STATE = 1
ORDER BY `DATE` DESC, EXCH_REG_DATE DESC, RFND_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM `ORDER` WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id} ORDER BY DATE DESC LIMIT 1
